document.full_text: gold prices rallied to a record high $1,497.20 an ounce on monday after standard & poor's downgraded its credit outlook for the united states and as investors worried about debt in the euro zone and inflation in china.
document.title: gold hits record near $1,500 after s&p cut
lines_and_colors: gold prices rallied to a record high $1,497.20 an ounce on monday after standard & poor's downgraded its credit outlook for the united states and as investors worried about debt in the euro zone and inflation in china.
